importantChapters.reason: High weightage in previous years, fundamental concepts.
Frequently asked in both objective and descriptive questions.
Forms the basis for many other chapters in calculus.

questionTypes.description: Focus on conceptual clarity. Often tricky.
1-2 mark questions testing definitions and basic formulas.
3-4 mark questions requiring derivations or short explanations.
5-mark questions, usually with internal choices. Tests in-depth understanding.
